scripts.compile:secp256k1: docker build -f wasm/docker/secp256k1.Dockerfile . -t bitcoin-ts-secp256k1 && docker run -it --mount type=bind,src=$(pwd)/src/lib,dst=/bitcoin-ts/out,consistency=delegated bitcoin-ts-secp256k1
scripts.compile:hashes: docker build -f wasm/docker/hashes.Dockerfile . -t bitcoin-ts-hashes && docker run -it --mount type=bind,src=$(pwd)/src/lib,dst=/bitcoin-ts/out,consistency=delegated bitcoin-ts-hashes
scripts.build:fix-asmcrypto: cpy node_modules/asmcrypto.js/src/aes/aes.asm.d.ts node_modules/asmcrypto.js/dist_es8/aes && cpy node_modules/asmcrypto.js/src/bignum/bigint.asm.d.ts node_modules/asmcrypto.js/dist_es8/bignum && cpy node_modules/asmcrypto.js/src/hash/sha1/sha1.asm.d.ts node_modules/asmcrypto.js/dist_es8/hash/sha1 && cpy node_modules/asmcrypto.js/src/hash/sha256/sha256.asm.d.ts node_modules/asmcrypto.js/dist_es8/hash/sha256 && cpy node_modules/asmcrypto.js/src/hash/sha512/sha512.asm.d.ts node_modules/asmcrypto.js/dist_es8/hash/sha512
scripts.build:wasm: run-p copy:wasm:secp256k1 copy:wasm:sha1 copy:wasm:sha256 copy:wasm:sha512 copy:wasm:ripemd160
scripts.copy:wasm:secp256k1: cpy src/lib/bin/secp256k1/secp256k1.wasm build/main/lib/bin/secp256k1 && cpy src/lib/bin/secp256k1/secp256k1.wasm build/module/lib/bin/secp256k1
scripts.copy:wasm:sha1: cpy src/lib/bin/sha1/sha1.wasm build/main/lib/bin/sha1 && cpy src/lib/bin/sha1/sha1.wasm build/module/lib/bin/sha1
scripts.copy:wasm:sha256: cpy src/lib/bin/sha256/sha256.wasm build/main/lib/bin/sha256 && cpy src/lib/bin/sha256/sha256.wasm build/module/lib/bin/sha256
scripts.copy:wasm:sha512: cpy src/lib/bin/sha512/sha512.wasm build/main/lib/bin/sha512 && cpy src/lib/bin/sha512/sha512.wasm build/module/lib/bin/sha512
scripts.copy:wasm:ripemd160: cpy src/lib/bin/ripemd160/ripemd160.wasm build/main/lib/bin/ripemd160 && cpy src/lib/bin/ripemd160/ripemd160.wasm build/module/lib/bin/ripemd160
scripts.bench:browser-deps: browserify node_modules/chuhai/index.js --standalone chuhai -o build/bench/chuhai.js && browserify node_modules/hash.js/lib/hash.js --standalone hash -o build/bench/hash.js
scripts.watch: run-s clean build:fix-asmcrypto build:main build:wasm && run-p "build:main -- -w" "test:unit -- --watch"
scripts.watch:no-crypto: run-s clean build:fix-asmcrypto build:main build:wasm && run-p "build:main -- -w" "test:unit:no-crypto -- --watch"
scripts.cov: run-s build test:unit cov:html && opn coverage/index.html

scripts-info.bench: Build the project and run the benchmarks
scripts-info.watch: Watch and rebuild the project on save, then rerun relevant tests
scripts-info.cov: Rebuild, run tests, then create and open the coverage report
scripts-info.doc: Generate HTML API documentation and open it in a browser
scripts-info.doc:json: Generate API documentation in typedoc JSON format
scripts-info.compile: Compile the WebAssembly binaries and integrate them into src
scripts-info.compile:debug:secp256k1: Run the compile:secp256k1 Docker container in interactive mode
scripts-info.compile:inspect:secp256k1: Format the compile:secp256k1 output for easier review
scripts-info.version: Bump package.json version, update CHANGELOG.md, tag release
scripts-info.reset: Delete all untracked files and reset the repo to the last commit
scripts-info.prepare-release: One-step: clean, build, test, publish docs, and prep a release
